name: opconsole
working_directory: /Users/zhangjinwei/Documents/备份资料/工作期间/运维工具/opconsole控制台/OPConsole-v4.1.16
script_content:
#!/bin/bash

# Configuration
SERVICE_NAME="OPConsole"
RUN_DIR="$(dirname $(realpath $0))"
DAEMON_SCRIPT="${RUN_DIR}/test.sh"
ORIGINAL_NAME="OPConsole"
APP_NAME_FILE="appName.txt"
PID_FILE="${RUN_DIR}/pid.txt"
LOG_FILE="${RUN_DIR}run.log"
SYSTEMD_SERVICE="/etc/systemd/system/${SERVICE_NAME}.service"

# Get the app suffix
get_app_suffix() {
    if [ -f "$APP_NAME_FILE" ]; then
        cat "$APP_NAME_FILE"
    else
        echo "Error: App name file not found!" >&2
        exit 1
    fi
}

# Get the full app name
get_app_name() {
    echo "${ORIGINAL_NAME}-$(get_app_suffix)"
}

# Check if daemon is running
is_running() {
    [ -f "$PID_FILE" ] && kill -0 $(cat "$PID_FILE") 2>/dev/null
}

# Start the daemon
start() {
    if is_running; then
        echo "Service is already running (PID $(cat $PID_FILE))"
        return 1
    fi

    echo "Starting service..."
    nohup "$DAEMON_SCRIPT" >> "$LOG_FILE" 2>&1 &
    DAEMON_PID=$!
    echo $DAEMON_PID > "$PID_FILE"
    echo "Service started with PID $DAEMON_PID"
}

# Stop the daemon using PID
stop() {
    if ! is_running; then
        echo "Service is not running"
        [ -f "$PID_FILE" ] && rm -f "$PID_FILE"
        return 1
    fi

    DAEMON_PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
    echo "Stopping service (PID $DAEMON_PID)..."

    kill -TERM $DAEMON_PID 2>/dev/null

    TIMEOUT=10
    while kill -0 $DAEMON_PID 2>/dev/null && [ $TIMEOUT -gt 0 ]; do
        sleep 1
        ((TIMEOUT--))
    done

    if kill -0 $DAEMON_PID 2>/dev/null; then
        kill -KILL $DAEMON_PID 2>/dev/null
        echo "Service forcefully stopped"
    else
        echo "Service stopped gracefully"
    fi

    rm -f "$PID_FILE"
    pkill -f "$(get_app_name)" 2>/dev/null
}

# Install systemd service
install_systemd() {
    cat > "$SYSTEMD_SERVICE" <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=OPConsole Service Daemon
After=network.target

[Service]
Type=forking
ExecStart=$(realpath $0) start
ExecStop=$(realpath $0) stop
Restart=on-failure
PIDFile=$PID_FILE
WorkingDirectory=$(dirname $DAEMON_SCRIPT)

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

    systemctl daemon-reload
    systemctl enable $SERVICE_NAME
    echo "Systemd service installed and enabled"
    echo "Use 'systemctl start $SERVICE_NAME' to start"
}

# Install SysVinit script
install_sysvinit() {
    if [ -d "/etc/init.d" ]; then
        ln -s $(realpath $0) /etc/init.d/$SERVICE_NAME
        update-rc.d $SERVICE_NAME defaults
        echo "SysVinit script installed"
        echo "Use '/etc/init.d/$SERVICE_NAME start' to start"
    else
        echo "Error: SysVinit directory not found!" >&2
        return 1
    fi
}

# Uninstall service
uninstall() {
    stop

    # Remove systemd service
    if [ -f "$SYSTEMD_SERVICE" ]; then
        systemctl stop $SERVICE_NAME
        systemctl disable $SERVICE_NAME
        rm -f "$SYSTEMD_SERVICE"
        systemctl daemon-reload
        echo "Systemd service uninstalled"
    fi

    # Remove SysVinit script
    if [ -L "/etc/init.d/$SERVICE_NAME" ]; then
        update-rc.d -f $SERVICE_NAME remove
        rm -f "/etc/init.d/$SERVICE_NAME"
        echo "SysVinit script uninstalled"
    fi

    echo "Service fully uninstalled"
}

# Check status
status() {
    if is_running; then
        DAEMON_PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
        echo "Service is running (PID $DAEMON_PID)"
        APP_NAME=$(get_app_name)
        if pgrep -f "$APP_NAME" >/dev/null; then
            echo "Application $APP_NAME is running"
        else
            echo "Warning: Daemon running but application $APP_NAME not found!"
        fi
    else
        echo "Service is not running"
        [ -f "$PID_FILE" ] && rm -f "$PID_FILE"
    fi

    # Check installation status
    if [ -f "$SYSTEMD_SERVICE" ]; then
        echo "Systemd service: Installed ($SYSTEMD_SERVICE)"
    elif [ -L "/etc/init.d/$SERVICE_NAME" ]; then
        echo "SysVinit service: Installed (/etc/init.d/$SERVICE_NAME)"
    else
        echo "Auto-start: Not configured"
    fi
}

# Main logic
case "$1" in
    start)
        start
        ;;
    stop)
        stop
        ;;
    restart)
        stop
        sleep 1
        start
        ;;
    status)
        status
        ;;
    install)
        if systemctl --version &>/dev/null; then
            install_systemd
        else
            install_sysvinit
        fi
        ;;
    uninstall)
        uninstall
        ;;
    *)
        echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart|status|install|uninstall}"
        echo "  install   - Configure auto-start on boot"
        echo "  uninstall - Remove auto-start configuration"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac

exit 0
